mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* ,G.UPP_DMNG_ID ,G.UPP_DMNG_LNM FROM WDQQ_SDITM A LEFT OUTER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG G ON A.DMNG_LNM = G.DMNG_LNM LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_LNM = B.INFOTP_LNM AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP C ON B.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID AND G.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON C.DMNG_ID = D.DMNG_ID AND D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO , A.SDITM_ID, A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM , A.LNM_CRI_DS, A.PNM_CRI_DS , A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_RMK, A.VRF_CD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_ID, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , A.INFOTP_LNM, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, NVL(B.ENC_YN,NVL(C.ENC_YN,'N')) AS ENC_YN , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.PERS_INFO_YN
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
-- , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WDQQ_SDITM A LEFT JOIN WDQM_DMN B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_PNM LEFT JOIN WDQQ_DMN C ON C.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND C.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
SELECT SDITM_ID FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into WDQQ_SDITM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_ID, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_RMK, VRF_CD, DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, PERS_INFO_YN) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{persInfoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
PERS_INFO_YN,

UPPER(#{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),

UPPER( #{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),

SYSDATE ,
#{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE ,

INSERT INTO WDQQ_SDITM (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, RQST_DCD, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, INFOTP_LNM, INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN, PERS_INFO_YN) SELECT A.RQST_NO, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+ROWNUM ,A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.DMN_LNM, A.DMN_PNM, A.INFOTP_ID, A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL, A.INFOTP_LNM ,'N',A.OBJ_DESCN, 1 , A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID,A.ENC_YN, A.PERS_INFO_YN FROM WDQQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM B WHERE A.DMN_LNM = B.SDITM_LNM AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO)

INSERT INTO WDQQ_SDITM ( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO , SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM , RQST_DCD , DMNG_LNM , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID , INFOTP_LNM , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL , INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN,RVW_STS_CD,RVW_CONTS,VRF_CD, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS ) SELECT A.RQST_NO, (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})+ROWNUM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.RQST_DCD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_LNM , A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , 'N' , A.OBJ_DESCN , 1 , NVL((SELECT 'U' FROM WDQM_SDITM SD WHERE A.DMN_ID = SD.DMN_ID AND A.DMN_LNM = SD.SDITM_LNM),'C') AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID,NVL(A.ENC_YN,'N') AS ENC_YN,A.RVW_STS_CD,A.RVW_CONTS,VRF_CD, SYSDATE, '자동생성' , '' AS LNM_CRI_DS , '' AS PNM_CRI_DS FROM WDQQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND A.RVW_STS_CD ='1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )

INSERT INTO WDQQ_SDITM ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , SDITM_LNM , SDITM_PNM , RQST_DCD , DMNG_LNM , DMN_LNM , DMN_PNM , INFOTP_ID , INFOTP_LNM , DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN , DATA_SCAL , INFOTP_CHG_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID,ENC_YN , RVW_STS_CD,RVW_CONTS , VRF_CD , APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , LNM_CRI_DS , PNM_CRI_DS ) SELECT A.RQST_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_SNO , NVL(C.SDITM_LNM,A.DMN_LNM) AS SDITM_LNM , NVL(C.SDITM_PNM,A.DMN_PNM) AS SDITM_PNM , A.RQST_DCD , A.DMNG_LNM , A.DMN_LNM , A.DMN_PNM , A.INFOTP_ID , A.INFOTP_LNM , A.DATA_TYPE, A.DATA_LEN, A.DATA_SCAL , 'N' , NVL(C.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_DESCN) AS OBJ_DESCN , 1 , (CASE WHEN C.SDITM_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END) AS REG_TYP_CD , A.FRS_RQST_DTM , A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID , NVL(A.ENC_YN,'N') AS ENC_YN , A.RVW_STS_CD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.VRF_CD , SYSDATE , '자동생성' , C.LNM_CRI_DS AS LNM_CRI_DS , C.PNM_CRI_DS AS PNM_CRI_DS FROM WDQQ_DMN A INNER JOIN WAQ_MSTR B ON A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO LEFT JOIN WDQM_SDITM C ON C.DMN_ID = A.DMN_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- AND A.SDITM_AUTO_CRT_YN = 'Y' AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('U') AND A.DMNG_LNM = '코드' AND A.INFOTP_ID != C.INFOTP_ID -- 코드도메인인포타입 변경시만 생성 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.update:
update WDQQ_SDITM
SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SDITM_PNM = UPPER(#{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PNM_CRI_DS = #{pnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_PNM = UPPER(#{dmnPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), DMNG_ID = #{dmngId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMNG_LNM = #{dmngLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = SYSDATE,
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERS_INFO_YN = #{persInfoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WDQQ_SDITM set SDITM_ID = #{sditmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_LNM = #{sditmLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDITM_PNM = #{sditmPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNM_CRI_DS = #{lnmCriDs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_ID = #{dmnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DMN_LNM = #{dmnLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_ID = #{infotpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_LEN = #{dataLen,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DATA_SCAL = #{dataScal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INFOTP_LNM = #{infotpLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INFOTP_CHG_YN = #{infotpChgYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENC_YN = #{encYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERS_INFO_YN = #{persInfoYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

-- 도메인명은 있고 인포타입이 없을 경우 인포타입 정보를 찾아서 업데이트 한다.
UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM X ,(
SELECT MAX(INFOTP_LNM) AS Y1, MAX(DATA_TYPE) AS Y2, MAX(DATA_LEN) AS Y3, MAX(DATA_SCAL) AS Y4, MAX(DMNG_LNM) AS Y5 ,DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, DMNG_LNM FROM ( SELECT DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, DMNG_LNM FROM WDQM_DMN A JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE B ON A.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID AND B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') JOIN WAA_DMNG C ON A.DMNG_ID = C.DMNG_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN C WHERE A.DMN_LNM = C.DMN_LNM AND A.DMN_PNM = C.DMN_PNM AND C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND C.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) UNION ALL SELECT DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, INFOTP_LNM, DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL, DMNG_LNM FROM WDQQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' ) A
) A2 SET X.INFOTP_LNM = A2.Y1 , X.DATA_TYPE = A2.Y2 , X.DATA_LEN = A2.Y3 , X.DATA_SCAL = A2.Y4 , X.DMNG_LNM = A2.Y5 WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.DMN_LNM = A2.DMN_LNM
AND NVL(X.DMN_PNM, '_') = NVL(A2.DMN_PNM, '_') AND X.DMN_LNM IS NOT NULL AND X.INFOTP_LNM IS NULL -- AND X.INFOTP_ID IS NULL

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A SET (DATA_TYPE, DATA_LEN, DATA_SCAL) = (SELECT B.DATA_TYPE, B.DATA_LEN, B.DATA_SCAL FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE B WHERE B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND B.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.INFOTP_LNM IS NOT NULL
-- 도메인명은 있고 인포타입이 없을 경우 인포타입 정보를 찾아서 업데이트 한다.

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.SDITM_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WDQM_SDITM B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.SDITM_PNM = A.SDITM_PNM ) , A.SDITM_ID = ( SELECT B.SDITM_ID FROM WDQM_SDITM B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM AND B.SDITM_PNM = A.SDITM_PNM ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: -- 검증쿼리 : 등록요청 중인 표준항목 존재....(SI012) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WDQQ_SDITM D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM AND NVL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

-- 검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM
AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_SDITM D WHERE A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

INSERT INTO WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS ( BIZ_DTL_CD , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , VRF_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , VRF_DTL_CD , VRF_DTLS ) SELECT #{bizDtlCd} AS BIZ_DTL_CD ,A.RQST_NO ,A.RQST_SNO ,NVL(C.VRF_SNO,0) + 1 AS VRF_SNO ,0 AS RQST_DTL_SNO ,#{vrfDtlCd} AS VRF_DTL_CD ,NULL AS VRF_DTLS FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT MAX(VRF_SNO) AS VRF_SNO ,RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS A WHERE A.BIZ_DTL_CD = #{bizDtlCd} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} GROUP BY RQST_NO, RQST_SNO) C ON A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_SYMN D WHERE (A.STWD_LNM = NVL(D.SYMN_LNM,'_') AND A.STWD_PNM = NVL(D.SYMN_PNM,'_')) AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U'))
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_PDM_COL D WHERE A.SDITM_ID = D.PDM_COL_ID)

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.LNM_CRI_DS IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG D WHERE D.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' AND A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND E.VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_STWD E WHERE D.STWD_LNM = E.STWD_LNM AND D.STWD_PNM = E.STWD_PNM AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD F WHERE E.STWD_LNM = F.STWD_LNM AND E.STWD_PNM = F.STWD_PNM AND F.VRF_CD = '1' AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) )

-- 검증쿼리 : 인포타입별 데이터 타입 체크(SI013) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_INFO_TYPE D WHERE D.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM AND NVL(D.DATA_TYPE, '_') = NVL(A.DATA_TYPE, '_') AND NVL(D.DATA_LEN, 0) = NVL(A.DATA_LEN, 0) AND NVL(D.DATA_SCAL, 0) = NVL(A.DATA_SCAL, 0) )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP E ON D.DMNG_ID = E.DMNG_ID AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE F ON E.INFOTP_ID = F.INFOTP_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM = F.INFOTP_LNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN F WHERE D.DMN_LNM = F.DMN_LNM AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN D INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG E ON D.DMNG_LNM = E.DMNG_LNM AND E.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG_INFOTP_MAP F ON E.DMNG_ID = F.DMNG_ID AND F.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE G ON F.INFOTP_ID = G.INFOTP_ID AND G.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND A.INFOTP_LNM = G.INFOTP_LNM AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND NVL(A.DMN_PNM , '_') = D.DMN_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND D.VRF_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_DMN D WHERE A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM AND NVL(A.DMN_PNM , '_') = D.DMN_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN E WHERE D.DMN_LNM = E.DMN_LNM AND E.VRF_CD = '1' AND E.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )

-- 검증쿼리 (SI015) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.INFOTP_LNM LIKE '코드%' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_DMN C INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.INFOTP_ID = C.INFOTP_ID WHERE C.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM AND D.INFOTP_LNM != A.INFOTP_LNM )
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.SDITM_LNM != CONCAT( REPLACE(A.LNM_CRI_DS,';','') , A.DMN_LNM )

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.SDITM_LNM != D.SDITM_LNM AND A.SDITM_PNM = D.SDITM_PNM AND D.RQST_DCD = 'CU' UNION ALL SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_SDITM D WHERE D.SDITM_LNM != A.SDITM_LNM AND D.SDITM_PNM = A.SDITM_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM F WHERE D.SDITM_LNM = F.SDITM_LNM AND F.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.SDITM_PNM) > 30
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND LENGTH(A.SDITM_LNM) > 30
-- 검증쿼리 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND CASE WHEN SUBSTR(NVL(A.SDITM_PNM,'N'),1,1) BETWEEN '0' AND '9' THEN 'N' ELSE 'C' END = 'N'

-- 검증쿼리 AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_SDITM D INNER JOIN WDQM_DMN E ON E.DMN_ID = D.DMN_ID
WHERE A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM AND NVL(A.SDITM_PNM , '_') = NVL(D.SDITM_PNM , '_') AND NVL(A.LNM_CRI_DS , '_') = NVL(D.LNM_CRI_DS , '_') AND NVL(A.PNM_CRI_DS , '_') = NVL(D.PNM_CRI_DS , '_') AND NVL(A.DMN_LNM , '_') = NVL(E.DMN_LNM , '_')
-- AND NVL(A.ENC_YN , 'N') = NVL(D.ENC_YN , 'N') AND NVL(A.OBJ_DESCN , '_') = NVL(D.OBJ_DESCN , '_') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM
RVW_STS_CD = 1 , -- 임의로 검토완료처리 RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = SYSDATE , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A
A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,A.RVW_CONTS = '포함표준단어반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD,99) != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_STWD S INNER JOIN WAQ_STWD_CNFG C on C.STWD_LNM = S.STWD_LNM and C.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' WHERE S.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND S.RVW_STS_CD = '2' and A.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A
A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' ,A.RVW_CONTS = '포함도메인반려'
WHERE A.rqst_no = #{rqstNo} AND NVL(RVW_STS_CD,99) != '2' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RVW_STS_CD = '2' AND A.DMN_LNM = D.DMN_LNM )
mapper.sql: , A.SDITM_LNM, A.SDITM_PNM, A.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMN_ID, B.DMNG_ID, A.INFOTP_ID, A.INFOTP_CHG_YN, A.ENC_YN , A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID , A.PNM_CRI_DS,A.TRANS_YN, A.PERS_INFO_YN, A.DMN_PNM

, SDITM_LNM, SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID , PNM_CRI_DS,TRANS_YN, PERS_INFO_YN, DMN_PNM
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WDQQ_SDITM WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' -- 승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
-- WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A SET (SDITM_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.SDITM_ID AS SDITM_ID , NVL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WDQM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM
AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM
AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') )

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM X SET (DMN_ID, DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID) = ( SELECT MAX(B.DMN_ID), MAX(D.DMNG_ID), MAX(C.INFOTP_ID) FROM WDQQ_SDITM A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID FROM WDQQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' UNION ALL SELECT DMN_ID, DMN_LNM, DMN_PNM, DMNG_ID FROM WDQM_DMN B WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_DMN A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.DMN_LNM = B.DMN_LNM ) ) B ON B.DMN_LNM = A.DMN_LNM INNER JOIN WAA_DMNG D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND C.INFOTP_LNM = A.INFOTP_LNM WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.delete:
-- WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WDQM_SDITM A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM
)
mapper.update: -- WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE WDQH_SDITM SET EXP_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM B, WDQH_SDITM A WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM )
mapper.insert:
-- 검증쿼리 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQQ_SDITM D, ${tblnm} A WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.SDITM_LNM = D.SDITM_LNM
AND D.OBJ_DESCN IS NULL )

INSERT INTO WDQQ_SDITM( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,SDITM_ID ,SDITM_LNM ,SDITM_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_RMK ,VRF_CD ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,INFOTP_CHG_YN ,ENC_YN ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,PNM_CRI_DS ,PERS_INFO_YN ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,SDITM_ID ,SDITM_LNM ,SDITM_PNM ,LNM_CRI_DS ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,DMN_ID ,DMN_LNM ,INFOTP_ID ,DATA_TYPE ,DATA_LEN ,DATA_SCAL ,INFOTP_LNM ,INFOTP_CHG_YN ,ENC_YN ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,DMNG_ID ,DMNG_LNM ,DMN_PNM ,PNM_CRI_DS ,PERS_INFO_YN FROM WDQQ_SDITM A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'
mapper.update: UPDATE WDQH_SDITM A SET A.TRANS_YN = (SELECT NVL(B.TRANS_YN, 'N') FROM WDQH_SDITM B WHERE A.SDITM_ID = B.SDITM_ID AND (A.OBJ_VERS-1) = B.OBJ_VERS AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD')

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A SET RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_STWD_CNFG B INNER JOIN WDQQ_STWD C ON C.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND C.STWD_LNM = B.STWD_LNM AND C.REG_TYP_CD = 'C' AND C.RVW_STS_CD = '2' WHERE B.BIZ_DTL_CD = 'SDITM' AND B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

UPDATE WDQQ_SDITM A SET ( SDITM_PNM, LNM_CRI_DS, DMN_ID, DMNG_LNM, DMN_LNM, INFOTP_LNM , DMNG_ID, INFOTP_ID, INFOTP_CHG_YN, ENC_YN, OBJ_DESCN , FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, PNM_CRI_DS, TRANS_YN ) = (SELECT B.SDITM_PNM, B.LNM_CRI_DS, B.DMN_ID, E.DMNG_LNM, C.DMN_LNM, D.INFOTP_LNM , B.DMNG_ID, B.INFOTP_ID, B.INFOTP_CHG_YN, B.ENC_YN, B.OBJ_DESCN , B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, B.PNM_CRI_DS, B.TRANS_YN FROM WDQM_SDITM B INNER JOIN WDQM_DMN C ON C.DMN_ID = B.DMN_ID INNER JOIN WAA_INFO_TYPE D ON D.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') AND D.INFOTP_ID = B.INFOTP_ID INNER JOIN V_WAA_DMNG E ON E.DMNG_ID = B.DMNG_ID WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'D' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WDQM_SDITM B WHERE B.SDITM_LNM = A.SDITM_LNM )
